title: GTA  San Andreas User Files
description:
SAN ANDREAS USER FILES 

Hai friends this torrent contains user files of san andreas. it contains each and every missions that i have finished....

So u can use any of the user files and access to any mission you like(right from first mission to end of mission).

This is very use full for the people who have struck in any of the mission and struggling to move to next missions. And for the players who wants to play a particular mission they like.... 

I have also included walk through so u can use this and know the names of mission and how to play that.

Its full working......

so u have to do this.....

steps:
1) You first backup your old SA user files.
2) Copy any one user file from my torrent and paste it in my document. And u have to rename it. That is just remove the numbers only.
   The missions are saved in order so u can choose any user files u need by     guessing(use the walk through for mission names). 
3) Then start the game and load the mission you need.
4) If it does not contain your desired mission quit the game and replace another User file in my document as said above.
5) Enjoy!!!!!!!  


No need to worry about virus. it was checked by Kaspersky and Bitdefender...
